skillTree.name: Invulnerable Through Change
skillTree.description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

skillTree.name: Hates Nurgle
skillTree.description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.name: Master of Sorcery
skillTree.description: Through his immense wisdom and knowledge, Amon 'Chakai is a sorcerer without equal or peer.

skillTree.name: The Hand of Destiny
skillTree.description: Amon 'Chakai can doom any one creature to die in combat. The doomed one is almost certain to perish, such is the power of Amon 'Chakai.

skillTree.name: All Seeing Eye
skillTree.description: The baleful gaze of Amon 'Chakai strips the confidence to handle the winds of magic from the poor mortal who dares to tread within his reach.

skillTree.name: Portals of Entropy
skillTree.description: Amon 'Chakai despises civilization and order, and delights in bringing the world into entropy and Chaos. Nothing pleases him more than seeing the world broken and made anew in an endless state of flux.

skillTree.name: Chaos Upon Chaos
skillTree.description: Amon 'Chakai can impose his omnipotent will upon hapless mortals, twisting the natural flow of their destiny and bringing misery and ruination to their lives.

effects.description:
Changing of the Ways cost: -25% for "Force War"
	(factionwide)
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -1 turns for "Force War"

Changing of the Ways cost: -50% for "Force War"
	(factionwide)
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -2 turns for "Force War"

skillTree.name: Inspire Corruption
skillTree.description: Mortals are the mere playthings of Amon 'Chakai, for he has seen all that they can do and shall do. For him to guide them into a chosen path is the work of mere moments.

effects.description:
Changing of the Ways cost: -25% for "Force Rebellion"
	(factionwide)
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -1 turns for "Force War"

Changing of the Ways cost: -50% for "Force Rebellion"
	(factionwide)
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -2 turns for "Force War"

skillTree.name: Shatter the Bonds
skillTree.description: "I have watched you since your birth, and I have watched the birth of your father, his father, and all your ancestors. I have seen every footstep you have taken to come before me. There is nothing I do not know. You are here because I wished it. Did you not know that!"

effects.description: Changing of the Ways cooldown: -1 turns for "Break Alliance"

Changing of the Ways cost: -25% for "Break Alliance"
	(factionwide)
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -2 turns for "Break Alliance"

Changing of the Ways cost: -50% for "Break Alliance"
	(factionwide)

skillTree.name: World into Ruin
skillTree.description: Amon 'Chakai can destroy or elevate both his followers and his enemies by what appears to be a mere whim, for the motives behind the actions of Greater Daemons are not for mortals to comprehend.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Blue Fire of Tzeentch Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Chillwind Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Word of Pain"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Word of Pain Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Word of Pain Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Bladewind Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Doombolt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Accursed Horrors
skillTree.description: Though they may appear ridiculous, the whirling, screeching footsoldiers of the Great Conspirator are the iron in his feathered martial glove.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +8% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +5% for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +16% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Myriad Servants
skillTree.description: Although it can be said that they have failed His tests, the broken minds and fluctuating, mutated bodies of Tzeeneth's lesser minions still have their uses.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Chaos Furies, Marauders of Tzeentch and Screamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Chaos Furies, Marauders of Tzeentch and Screamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Many-Coloured Fires
skillTree.description: Unburdened by mass, Tzeentch's flaming servants surge toward the foe – the heralds of their utter doom, no less.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Riders of Change
skillTree.description: The thundering of their Chaos Steeds and chariots announces the arrival of Kaldour's dread Knights, and death is never far behind them.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +16% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warped Retainers
skillTree.description: For the Winged Watchers and Doomstriders of this world, their very lack of identifiable corporeal form shall be their armour against attack.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Horrific Advancement
skillTree.description: Even the bravest, most rational souls waver in the hideous, laughing face of their worst nightmares.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Arsenal of Insanity
skillTree.description: Of the many weapons available to Tchar, derangement must surely be the greatest and most satsifying to wield.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch, Lord of Change and Soul Grinder units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +6 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch, Lord of Change and Soul Grinder units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch, Lord of Change and Soul Grinder units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Incendiary Ascent
skillTree.description: The flickering beings of flame are in many ways the purest servants of the Changer, for their gaseous forms are ever in a state of flux.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +24% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Armour of Delirium
skillTree.description: The best form of defence is attack, and the best form of attack is the one which reaches into the foe's mind and turns its contents against them.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Arch-Manipulator
skillTree.description: As they are a most adept and dedicated magic-user, where this one treads, the Winds always blow high and hard.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +15%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +15%
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Called by Change
skillTree.description: The promise of Change, though it may amount to nothing more than the cruellest of tricks, ensures the forces of Tzeeneth are fed and nourished.

skillTree.name: Scrolls of Destiny
skillTree.description: The many faces of the Wind-lord are described here, along with all the terrible mysteries of destiny. Between these lines lurks insanity, ever waiting to trap the unwary.

skillTree.name: Legions of Madness
skillTree.description: Tzeentch knows that at their cores all beings desire Change, and as such there are no shortage of recruits willing to march under his many-coloured banner.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Entropic Weaver
backgroundSkills.description: Amon 'Chakai is the wisest and oldest of all the Lords of Change. While others of his kind are intelligent beyond Human comprehension, Amon 'Chakai alone holds ultimate knowledge over fate and destiny.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Treason of Tzeentch"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Infernal Gateway"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Treason of Tzeentch Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Infernal Gateway Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
